title: How the DHS Became the KGB with Senator Ted Cruz
itunes:title: How the DHS Became the KGB with Senator Ted Cruz
description:
There’s a breaking story taking place that most media outlets are blatantly ignoring, but Charlie steps in to unpack the unlawful and unconstitutional actions exposed in the DHS Leaks, a story published by a left leaning news outlet, "The Intercept." Charlie  breaks down how this affects YOU and the ongoing war against the ‘disinformation police.’ He’s also joined by outspoken Senator Ted Cruz to talk about his new book, ‘Justice Corrupted: How the Left Weaponized Our Legal System,’ and they dive into all of the unspoken truths about January 6th that the Senator witnessed firsthand on that fateful day.

For Bioptimizers go to www.bioptimizers.com/kirk and use Promo Code kirk10

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
